mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_LIST WHERE TRUNC(ORDER_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_LIST WHERE TRUNC(ORDER_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ORDER_STATUS = 'D'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_LIST WHERE TRUNC(ORDER_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ORDER_STATUS IN ('P')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUESTION WHERE QS_STATUS = '0'OR QS_STATUS = '1'

SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ORDER_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "date", SUM(PRICE) AS "sales" FROM ORDER_LIST WHERE ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 6 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) + 1 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ORDER_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY "date" ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT O.ORDER_KEY AS "orderKey", M.USERID AS "userId", O.PRICE AS "price", O.ORDER_STATUS AS "orderStatus" FROM ORDER_LIST O JOIN MEMBER M ON O.USERID = M.USERID ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT P.ITEM_NO AS "itemNo", P.ITEM_NAME AS "itemName", P.PRICE AS "price", P.SELL_COUNT AS "totalCount", I.FILEPATH AS "imageUrl" FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRODUCT_IMG I ON I.ITEM_NO = P.ITEM_NO ORDER BY P.SELL_COUNT DESC FETCH FIRST 3 ROWS ONLY

SELECT POST_ID as postId, TITLE, CONTENTS, USERID as userId, CDATETIME as cdatetime, CNT as cnt, POST_CATEGORY as postCategory FROM RECIPE_POST
AND (TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
AND POST_CATEGORY = #{boardType}
ORDER BY POST_ID DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT REPLY_NO as replyNo, QS_NO as qsNo, USERID as userId, REPLY_CONTENTS as replyContents, ADMIN_ID as adminId FROM REPLY WHERE QS_NO = #{qsNo} ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC

SELECT d.DELIVERY_NO as deliveryNo, d.ORDER_KEY as orderKey, d.DELIVERY_STATUS as deliveryStatus, d.TRACKING_NUMBER as trackingNumber, TO_CHAR(d.DELIVERY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as deliveryDate, d.DELIVERY_FEE as deliveryFee, o.ORDER_DATE as orderDate, m.USERNAME as userName FROM DELIVERY d INNER JOIN ORDER_LIST o ON d.ORDER_KEY = o.ORDER_KEY INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON o.USERID = m.USERID ORDER BY d.DELIVERY_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT d.DELIVERY_NO as deliveryNo, d.ORDER_KEY as orderKey, d.CART_KEY as cartKey, d.DELIVERY_STATUS as deliveryStatus, d.TRACKING_NUMBER as trackingNumber, TO_CHAR(d.DELIVERY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as deliveryDate, d.DELIVERY_FEE as deliveryFee, o.ORDER_DATE as orderDate, m.USERNAME as userName, m.PHONE as userPhone, m.EMAIL as userEmail, o.PRICE as orderPrice FROM DELIVERY d LEFT JOIN ORDER_LIST o ON d.ORDER_KEY = o.ORDER_KEY LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON o.USERID = m.USERID WHERE d.DELIVERY_NO = #{deliveryNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DELIVERY d LEFT JOIN ORDER_LIST o ON d.ORDER_KEY = o.ORDER_KEY LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON o.USERID = m.USERID
AND d.ORDER_KEY = #{searchKeyword}
AND d.TRACKING_NUMBER LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND m.USERNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT iq.IQ_NO as qsNo, iq.ITEM_NO as itemNo, p.ITEM_NAME as itemName, iq.USERID as userId, iq.IQ_TITLE as qsTitle, iq.IQ_CONTENTS as qsContents, iq.IQ_STATUS as qsStatus, TO_CHAR(iq.CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as cdatetime FROM ITEM_QUESTION iq LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON iq.ITEM_NO = p.ITEM_NO ORDER BY iq.IQ_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITEM_QUESTION

SELECT QS_NO as qsNo, USERID as userId, QS_TITLE as qsTitle, QS_CONTENTS as qsContents, QS_STATUS as qsStatus, TO_CHAR(CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as cdatetime, VIEW_CNT as viewCnt, QS_CATEGORY as qsCategory FROM QUESTION
AND QS_STATUS =
0 1
AND (QS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR QS_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')
ORDER BY QS_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUESTION
AND QS_STATUS = #{type == 'pending' ? '0' : '1'}

SELECT iq.IQ_NO as qsNo, iq.ITEM_NO as itemNo, p.ITEM_NAME as itemName, iq.USERID as userId, iq.IQ_TITLE as qsTitle, iq.IQ_CONTENTS as qsContents, iq.IQ_STATUS as qsStatus, TO_CHAR(iq.CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as cdatetime FROM ITEM_QUESTION iq LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON iq.ITEM_NO = p.ITEM_NO WHERE iq.IQ_NO = #{iqNo}
